main event: A UFO sighting was reported in the Illinois: Iowa area, involving a bright, disc-shaped object with intelligent movement.
interesting points: The object changed directions, descended and ascended, and parked in the air., It was described as having no sound and glowing intensely., The phenomenon lasted for about 20 minutes., The witness noted that the object made sudden, high-speed movements., A hand-drawn sketch depicting the sighting was included in the report.
witness description: Thomas J. Schoch, 17 years old, male, and an amateur astronomer.
